channel.title: sketch on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in sketch on Damien Saunders

item.title: Autodesk SketchBook Mobile comes to Android
item.description: SketchBook Mobile recently got a mention here as the best iPad app fro sketches, notes, photos and more … and now its available on Android. I bet if you have a Samsung Galaxy Tab – this should be the first app that really is worth paying for.With so many features – it can be hard to know where to start – so my suggestion is use it to play around with some of your photos.

item.title: Best iPad App for design and graphics gets better
item.description: Sketchbook Pro, in my opinion is the best iPad app for photo editing, graphic and web design. And its new update just makes it better. The new release makes it a great all round tool for note taking, wireframe and web design. A Power tool for notes, sketches and mockups I like to think I’m a pro digital photographer so I like my photo software to do amazing things – even if I cant.
